code: @Override protected Passage[] getSummaryPassagesNoHighlight(int maxPassages) {     if (noMatchSize > 0) {         int pos = 0.         while (pos < fieldValue.length() && fieldValue.charAt(pos) == MULTIVAL_SEP_CHAR) {             pos++.         }         if (pos < fieldValue.length()) {             int end = fieldValue.indexOf(MULTIVAL_SEP_CHAR, pos).             if (end == -1) {                 end = fieldValue.length().             }             if (noMatchSize + pos < end) {                 BreakIterator bi = BreakIterator.getWordInstance(breakIteratorLocale).                 bi.setText(fieldValue).                 // Finds the next word boundary **after** noMatchSize.                 end = bi.following(noMatchSize + pos).                 if (end == BreakIterator.DONE) {                     end = fieldValue.length().                 }             }             Passage passage = new Passage().             passage.setScore(Float.NaN).             passage.setStartOffset(pos).             passage.setEndOffset(end).             return new Passage[] { passage }.         }     }     return EMPTY_PASSAGE. }
